authorization.name: authorization
authorization.description: Enter your JWT token with Bearer prefix, e.g., Bearer eyJhbGciOi...

password.description: User password (min 8 characters, must include letters, numbers, and symbols)
User password (min 8 characters, must include letters, numbers, and symbols)

otp.description: One-time password sent to the user

post.description: Refreshes the access token using the refresh token.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: JWT refresh token with Bearer prefix
